title: Laser Beam vs. Pentagonal Prism | Ray Optics | Physics Simulations

media:group.media:title: Laser Beam vs. Pentagonal Prism | Ray Optics | Physics Simulations
media:group.media:description:
A simulation of a laser beam, consisting of many parallel rays of light, passing through a pentagonal prism.

- geometric optics, refraction, reflection
- prism has a refractive index of 1.4
- 25fps
- programmed in C#, custom physics engine

#Physics #PhysicsSimulations #Refraction
